golad.lib

Interface Move


  • public interface Move
    Represents a player's move on a GOLAD Board.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127
    See Also:
    Board

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Move.Type
      Denotes the type of a move.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move.Type getMoveType()
      Returns the Type of this move.
      Board getNewState()
      Returns the state this board is/will be in after this move.
      Board getOriginalState()
      Returns the state this board was/is in before this move.
      int getSacrificeX(int index)
      Returns the X coordinate of the n-th sacrificed cell.
      int getSacrificeY(int index)
      Returns the Y coordinate of the n-th sacrificed cell.
      int getTargetX()
      Returns the X coordinate of the targeted cell.
      int getTargetY()
      Returns the Y coordinate of the targeted cell.

      • getSacrificeX

        int getSacrificeX(int index)
                  throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the X coordinate of the n-th sacrificed cell.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the sacrificed cell within the list of cells sacrificed in this move.
        Returns:
        The X coordinate of the n-th sacrificed cell
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If index is less than 0 or greater or equal to getMoveType().sacrifices .
        See Also:
        getSacrificeY(int), getMoveType(), Move.Type.sacrifices

      • getSacrificeY

        int getSacrificeY(int index)
                  throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns the Y coordinate of the n-th sacrificed cell.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the sacrificed cell within the list of cells sacrificed in this move.
        Returns:
        The Y coordinate of the n-th sacrificed cell
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If index is less than 0 or greater or equal to getMoveType().sacrifices .
        See Also:
        getSacrificeX(int), getMoveType(), Move.Type.sacrifices
